decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then use cards like Animate Dead and Reanimate to bring them back onto the battlefield without paying their mana costs. This allows for explosive plays and strong board presence early in the game. The deck also includes disruption cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo pieces and ensure they can execute their game plan effectively. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big threats and win the game quickly.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Grief, then bringing them back into play with Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also incorporates disruptive elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo. Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty provide additional threats to close out the game. The deck also includes cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm for card selection and consistency. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with reanimated creatures while maintaining control of the game.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Griselbrand, then utilize spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back onto the battlefield for a devastating combo. Cards like Entomb and Brainstorm help set up the graveyard and find the necessary pieces, while counter spells like Force of Will and Daze help protect the combo. The deck also includes cards like Grief and Fatal Push for disruption and removal, making it a versatile and powerful reanimator strategy in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, using cards like Entomb and Animate Dead. By utilizing combos and reanimation spells, the goal is to bring back these creatures onto the battlefield before the opponent can react, overwhelming them with powerful threats. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Daze and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces and control the game. Overall, the strategy revolves around leveraging the graveyard as a resource to quickly establish board dominance.

The deck focuses on utilizing Cloudpost mana ramp to accelerate into powerful threats like Karn, the Great Creator and Emrakul, the Aeons Torn. It includes various utility lands and cards like Planar Nexus to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Crop Rotation is used to tutor for key lands like The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale or Eye of Ugin. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats and powerful abilities while maintaining control over the game with its lands and disruption cards.

The main focus of the deck is to use cards like Voltaic Key, Basalt Monolith, and Paradox Engine to generate infinite mana, allowing you to cast and activate multiple spells in the same turn. Mystic Forge and Karn, the Great Creator provide card advantage and utility to help set up the combo pieces. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo and win the game by either casting Emrakul, the Aeons Torn for a big finish or overwhelming the opponent with a powerful board presence. The inclusion of Urza's Saga and Urza's Workshop further supports the artifact-based strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then using reanimation spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back onto the battlefield for a devastating combo finish. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its game plan, as well as card selection spells like Ponder and Brainstorm to find the necessary pieces. With the ability to quickly and efficiently reanimate threats, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and win with powerful creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently get powerful creatures into play from the graveyard using spells like Entomb and Reanimate. By utilizing cards like Grief and Troll of Khazad-dûm to disrupt the opponent's hand and board, while also having counter spells like Force of Will and Daze for protection, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The land base is focused on consistency and disruption, with Wasteland and Underground Sea providing valuable resources for the deck's strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, then reanimate them onto the battlefield using spells like Animate Dead and Reanimate. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect your combo pieces. With a strong focus on graveyard interaction and efficient spells, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while controlling the game with cards like Wasteland and Brazen Borrower.

This deck focuses on using lands to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. It utilizes cards like Life from the Loam and Exploration to quickly ramp up land plays, while also using Wasteland and Ghost Quarter to disrupt the opponent's mana base. The key win condition revolves around the Dark Depths combo, using Thespian's Stage to create a 20/20 Marit Lage token. The deck also includes utility lands like Maze of Ith and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale to further control the board and slow down the opponent's game plan.

The main strategy of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Grief, then bring them back into play using Reanimate and Animate Dead. It utilizes a mix of disruptive elements like Daze and Force of Will to protect its combo pieces and control the game. The deck also includes cards like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier as powerful threats to close out the game. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brainstorm provide card advantage and manipulation to help find key pieces of the combo.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Entomb and Grief. Then, the player can use Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring these creatures back onto the battlefield for a fast and aggressive combo strategy. Cards like Brainstorm and Ponder help with card selection and manipulation, while counterspells like Force of Will and Daze protect the combo from disruption. The deck also includes disruptive creatures like Brazen Borrower and Troll of Khazad-dûm to further disrupt the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It utilizes powerful cards like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt the opponent's game plan while drawing cards and setting up favorable board states with Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and establish dominance by managing threats efficiently, protecting its own key cards, and ultimately overwhelming the opponent with superior card advantage and control elements, such as Tune the Narrative and Wrath of the Skies.

The main concept of this combo-reanimator deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Grief, then bring them back onto the battlefield with Animate Dead and Reanimate to overwhelm your opponent. The deck also includes disruption spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect your combo pieces and control the game. By efficiently reanimating high-impact creatures like Archon of Cruelty, Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and Psychic Frog, you aim to outvalue and outpace your opponent in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The deck aims to control the game through disruption and card advantage, using powerful spells like Brainstorm, Hymn to Tourach, and Force of Will to keep the opponent in check. Cards like Fatal Push and Kolaghan's Command provide removal options while Snapcaster Mage and Jace, the Mind Sculptor offer additional value and card selection. The inclusion of Psychic Frog and Orcish Bowmasters adds unique ways to control the board, while Cling to Dust helps with card advantage and graveyard hate. Overall, the deck focuses on outlasting the opponent and winning through attrition.

The main focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan by playing disruptive permanents like Chalice of the Void and Blood Moon while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Broadside Bombardiers. The deck aims to lock the opponent out of the game by utilizing mana acceleration from cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide, and finish the game quickly with powerful creatures and burn spells like Fury and Shatterskull Smashing. The deck's strategy revolves around quick and efficient threats that can end the game before the opponent can stabilize.
